message.body: Can i come hunt for tango clothes tonight? What time are you gonna be in the costume closet?
Oh no! Ill be in plainfield tomorrow, is there any other time i can come? Tobight? Tonorrow morning?
Lemme know, I'll he home around 9 or 10
You wanna just text me a list of stuff?
Im happy to stop by at 9 or 10, but I'm looking for 3or 4 flowy dresses or skirts preferably white but can be other color
I can handle that. It would be nice to see you, if you wanna come by, but I can do it. What should we do about your song? Claire?
For my piece: Regular period street clothing w gas masks, like suits for men flower print dresses for women. Ill come by at 10, hows that?
I mean the singing. Did you read Erica email? He is not comfortable singing the song bc his character is too sweet. I thought Claire could be stunning and she's not singing at all yet
I told him he doesnt need to be in character or that he can sing it from sad, disillusioned, hopeless sarcasm
Was that after the email? I think It might be really powerful from a woman, think about Claire. I got your costumes, have a great weekend, see you sunday, sweets
It was after the email. Im not sure that Claire has the confidence im looking for. And Awesome thanks for diggin in the costumes!
